item.title: CVE-2012-3409|2024-08-06T20:05:12.386Z -- ecryptfs-utils -- ecryptfs-utils
item.description: ecryptfs-utils: suid helper does not restrict mounting filesystems with nosuid,nodev which creates a possible privilege escalation
